topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Create an OSadmin User for VSD

p.i: Return to the Installing the KVM + ESX Deployment.

body.section:
You must create an administrative user called OSadmin and add it to CMS Group.To create the OSadmin user:
Use a web browser such as Chrome/FireFox to launch the VSD Architect dashboard using the DCM IP and port 8443. For example: https://10.x.x.x:8443/ Default credentials: User Name: csproot Password: csproot Org: csp VSD Server : auto
The main page appears.
Click the Open Platform Configuration tab on the top right corner of the dashboard.
Click the Settings tab.
Click the User icon on the left panel.
Right-click the csproot user and click Add.
To create a user for the plug-in, click the Open VSP Configuration tab on the top right corner of the dashboard.
Click the CSP Users tab and click +.
Create a user named OSadmin with the password OSadmin. The name and password are case-sensitive. Do not copy and paste from here into the field.
Click Create.
Click the Groups icon to add the user to the CMS Group
Select the CMS Group, then click the link icon click OSadmin.

p.i: Return to the Installing the KVM + ESX Deployment.
